question:
Which comment is most useful for the following code? 
print("You said:", adj1 + " " + noun1)

answers.text: # Append adj1 and noun1

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: This comment is not useful, because words like "bunch" and "stuff" are too vague.

answers.text: # Print out a bunch of stuff

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: This comment is not useful, because the comment simply repeats the code in English.

answers.text: # Show the resulting phrase

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: This comment explains the intent of the code. If the code had a mistake, the programmer reading the comment might notice the mistake more easily.

detailedSolution: This comment explains the intent of the code. If the code had a mistake, the programmer reading the comment might notice the mistake more easily.
